option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?php

namespace Modules\LasParser\Models;

use Illuminate\Database\Eloquent\Model;

class LasCurveData extends Model
{
    protected $table = 'las_curve_data';

    protected $guarded = [];

    protected $casts = [
        'extras' => 'array',
    ];

    public function file()
    {
        return $this->belongsTo(LasFile::class, 'las_file_id');
    }
}

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?php

namespace Modules\LasParser\Models;

use Illuminate\Database\Eloquent\Model;

class LasFile extends Model
{
    protected $table = 'las_files';

    protected $guarded = [];

    protected $casts = [
        'header_meta' => 'array',
        'error_log' => 'array',
    ];

    public function curves()
    {
        return $this->hasMany(LasCurveData::class, 'las_file_id');
    }
}

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# Módulo LasParser
Este módulo contiene la lógica de ingestión y parsing de archivos LAS (.las) para el sistema GeoCodex.
Estructura principal (MVP): - database/migrations: migraciones del módulo - Models: Eloquent models propios del módulo - Jobs: jobs para parsing - Services: reader/parsers streaming - tests/fixtures: fixtures para tests unitarios/feature
Reglas: - Todos los artefactos del módulo residen en `Modules/LasParser` - Storage: `local` en desarrollo; S3 en staging/production - Queue: `database` en `local`; `redis` en staging/production

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?php

use Illuminate\Database\Migrations\Migration;
use Illuminate\Database\Schema\Blueprint;
use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Schema;

class CreateLasFilesTable extends Migration
{
    public function up()
    {
        Schema::create('las_files', function (Blueprint $table) {
            $table->bigIncrements('id');
            $table->unsignedBigInteger('tenant_id');
            $table->unsignedBigInteger('user_id');
            $table->string('filename');
            $table->string('storage_path');
            $table->bigInteger('size_bytes')->nullable();
            $table->string('status')->default('PENDING');
            $table->integer('version')->default(1);
            $table->json('header_meta')->nullable();
            $table->json('error_log')->nullable();
            $table->bigInteger('rows_expected')->nullable();
            $table->bigInteger('rows_inserted')->default(0);
            $table->timestamps();

            $table->index(['tenant_id']);
            $table->index(['status']);
        });
    }

    public function down()
    {
        Schema::dropIfExists('las_files');
    }
}

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?php

use Illuminate\Database\Migrations\Migration;
use Illuminate\Database\Schema\Blueprint;
use Illuminate\Support\Facades\Schema;

class CreateLasCurveDataTable extends Migration
{
    public function up()
    {
        Schema::create('las_curve_data', function (Blueprint $table) {
            $table->bigIncrements('id');
            $table->unsignedBigInteger('las_file_id');
            $table->unsignedBigInteger('tenant_id');
            $table->unsignedBigInteger('user_id');
            $table->decimal('depth', 18, 6)->nullable();
            $table->double('gr')->nullable();
            $table->double('dt')->nullable();
            $table->double('rhob')->nullable();
            $table->double('npor')->nullable();
            $table->json('extras')->nullable();
            $table->timestamps();

            $table->index(['las_file_id', 'depth']);
            $table->foreign('las_file_id')->references('id')->on('las_files')->onDelete('cascade');
        });
    }

    public function down()
    {
        Schema::dropIfExists('las_curve_data');
    }
}

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?php

namespace Modules\LasParser\Tests\Feature;

use PHPUnit\Framework\TestCase;

class ModuleSmokeTest extends TestCase
{
    public function test_module_files_exist()
    {
        $this->assertFileExists(__DIR__ . '/../fixtures/valid_2.0.las');
        $this->assertFileExists(__DIR__ . '/../fixtures/broken_header.las');
    }
}
